title: Avengers Doomsday's Simu Liu Bats For Hollywood Extras Making A Living: Maybe Actors Shouldn't Be Making $20 Million
description: With AI (artificial intelligence) possibly coming for the jobs of extras in Hollywood, actor Simu Liu defended the background extras. He started out as an extra on Guillermo del Toro's Pacific Rim, where he learned how to behave on a movie set. The Marvel star also felt it was not a wise financial decision. , Hollywood, Times Now
content: He may be a Marvel star now with the upcoming Avengers: Doomsday, but Simu Liu has risen through the ranks in Hollywood. During his early days, Simu worked as an extra and a stuntman. The actor credits his extra experience as beneficial, giving him a... [2249 chars]

title: SoftBank to acquire DigitalBridge for $4 billion
description: The acquisition would expand SoftBank's exposure to digital infrastructure as it positions its portfolio to focus on artificial intelligence.
content:
The acquisition would expand SoftBank’s exposure to digital infrastructure as the Japanese conglomerate is positioning its portfolio to focus on artificial intelligence.

title: OpenAI says it's hiring a head safety executive to mitigate AI risks
description: The company's investment in safety prevention comes amid growing concerns over the potential harm of artificial intelligence.
content:
OpenAI is seeking a new "head of preparedness" to guide the company's safety strategy amid mounting concerns over how artificial intelligence tools could be misused.
According to the job posting, the new hire will be paid $555,000 to lead the company... [3176 chars]

title: AI maps complex nanocrystal reactions, revealing new paths in semiconductor synthesis
description: Professor Joongoo Kang's team from the Department of Physics and Chemistry at DGIST and Professor Sohee Jeong's team from the Department of Energy Science at Sungkyunkwan University have developed a technology that visualizes the synthetic reaction pathways of semiconductor nanocrystals (colloidal quantum dots) using artificial intelligence (AI).

title: India to push for consensus on global AI governance norms at AI Summit 2026: MeitY Secretary S Krishnan
description: With participation expected from over 100 countries, India is positioning the AI Summit 2026 as a major global platform to shape common frameworks on artificial intelligence, bringing together political leadership, policymakers and top technology executives to drive convergence on AI governance.
